The :mod:`!sgf` module
----------------------

.. module:: sgfmill.sgf
   :synopsis: High level SGF interface.

The :mod:`!sgfmill.sgf` module provides the main high-level |sgf| interface.

It defines two public classes:

* :doc:`Sgf_game <sgf_games>` to represent an |sgf| ``GameTree``;
* :doc:`Tree_node <tree_nodes>` to represent an |sgf| ``Node``.

.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :hidden:

   sgf_games
   tree_nodes
